nodes.text: CT-642 was the designation of a carbon-freezing plant located on Coruscant.

Accompanied by a unit of clone troopers, Jedi Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Ahsoka Tano volunteered to have themselves temporarily frozen to gain access to the Gwori system and escape the droid's irradiation gate during the Clone Wars.
